itemDescription: born 1978; eldest child of Charles Wellesley, 9th Duke of Wellington, and Princess Antonia of Prussia

wikipedia_page.main:
Jemma Madeleine Kidd, Countess of Mornington (born 20 September 1974), is a British make up artist, fashion model, and aristocrat. 
She currently resides on the Stratfield Saye estate, Hampshire.

response: ** Arthur Wellesley, Earl of Mornington (born 1978), son of Charles Wellesley, 9th Duke of Wellington

Jodie was a showjumper as a child and attended St Michael's School, Burton Park, Petworth, West Sussex. Kidd has two siblings. Her elder sister, Jemma Kidd (born 1974), married Arthur Wellesley, Earl of Mornington, son of the current Duke of Wellington, in June 2005. Kidd's brother, Jack Kidd (born 1973) is a polo player. Kidd also has a half brother, the entrepreneur Nick D'Arcy Whiting (born 1962) and a half sister Debbie Parris (born 1964).Burke's Peerage volume 2 (2003), p. 1,932
* Arthur Wellesley, Earl of Mornington (born 31 January 1978)
*********Arthur Wellesley, Earl of Mornington (born 31 January 1978), married Jemma Kidd

Royal Households of the United Kingdom

response: Lady Charlotte Wellesley was born at St Mary's Hospital, London on 8 October 1990 to Princess Antonia of Prussia and Charles Wellesley, Marquess of Douro. After the death of her paternal grandfather, Valerian Wellesley, 8th Duke of Wellington, in 2014, her father succeeded him as the 9th Duke of Wellington, the 9th Prince of Waterloo, the 9th Duke of Victoria, and the 10th Duke of Ciudad Rodrigo. As such, she is part of the British, Belgian, Dutch, Portuguese, and Spanish nobility. Her mother, Princess Antonia, is the youngest child of Prince Frederick of Prussia and Lady Brigid Guinness. Through her mother, Lady Charlotte is a great-great granddaughter of Wilhelm II, German Emperor and a great-great-great-great granddaughter of Queen Victoria. As a descendant of Queen Victoria, she is in the Line of Succession to the British throne. Lady Charlotte grew up at Stratfield Saye House, her family's estate in Hampshire. She is the younger sister of Arthur Wellesley, Earl of Mornington.
